basics.name: Ahmad Muwaffaq
basics.label: Front-End Developer
basics.summary:
A passionate front-end developer with 2+ years of experience developing user interfaces around the web. I'm helping to bridge the gap between design and technical implementation for crafting seamless user experiences.

I'm experienced in the React ecosystem from barebone React to full-fledged Next.js. I also had a nice experience using Vue and Nuxt, and I'm always eager to explore new tools that can strengthen my skills.

work.name: Juragan Material
highlights: Develop and maintain in-house content management system (CMS) and e-commerce platform to serve our primary business processes.
Develop and maintain Juragan Vendor, inventory management system for our 200+ happy registered vendor.
Refactor and redesign the architecture of our e-commerce platform, from Nuxt v2 to Nuxt v3. Resulting in ~50% performance gain.
Develop, maintain and architecturing in-house UI component library to reduce repetitive components across repositories and to standardize our products look and feel.

work.name: Freelance
highlights: Hired for 3 months to help build a dashboard for a school management system using Ant Design and React.
Trusted by digital solutions company to slice design to code in 6 microsite projects; utilizing Gulp, Tailwind CSS and jQuery.

Develop and maintain 5 landing page  sites for local convection company sub-business. | Taking advantage of GatsbyJS to maximize performance. | Integrating Google Spreadsheet with Google App Script to gather order form information.
Handling revamp for a company profile website and integrating Google App Script with Spreadsheet and Drive.

work.name: Garena
highlights: Mainly responsible for translating design into front-end code and integrating with back-end services utilizing React, Redux and SCSS.
Maintain and improve web and animation performance.
Contributed to the in-house front-end project boilerplate by creating an error reporting helper for an API call.
Handled 15 projects which each project has daily active users ranging from 10K to over 50K.

projects.name: Garena Intern Projects
projects.description: I'm handling 15 projects during my intern period as a Front-End Developer Intern at Garena Indonesia. (Stack: React, Redux, SCSS).
